title: NH3 equil. graph - what occurs when NH3 is added

content.question: More NH3 gas is added to the system at time t2 while the temperature is held constant. Which of the following will most likely occur?

choices.label: The value of the equilibrium constant will increase
The value of the equilibrium constant will decrease.
The amount of N2 will increase.
The amount of H2 will decrease.

content.answer: The amount of N2 will increase.

skill.text: 2.F: Explain how modifications to an experimental procedure will alter results.
